biotools.summary: FastK is a k‑mer counter that is optimized for processing high quality DNA assembly data sets such as those produced with an Illumina instrument or a PacBio run in HiFi mode.

galaxy.summary: FastK: A K-mer counter (for HQ assembly data sets)
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: FastK is a k‑mer counter that is optimized for processing high quality DNA assembly data sets such as those produced with an Illumina instrument or a PacBio run in HiFi mode.
